text: The Men's African Qualifiers for the 1960 Summer Olympics tournament began in November 1959 and ended in April 1960.http://www.rsssf.com/tableso/ol1960q.html == Round 1 == === Group 1 === {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center" |- !width=175|Team !width=20| !width=20| !width=20| !width=20| !width=20| !width=20| !width=20| !width=20| |- style="background:#cfc;" |align="left"| |4||2||1||1||5||3||+2||5 |- |align="left"| |4||2||1||1||7||6||+1||5 |- |align="left"| |4||0||2||2||3||6||−3||2 |} \---- \---- \---- \---- \---- === Group 2 === {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center" |- !width=175|Team !width=20| !width=20| !width=20| !width=20| !width=20| !width=20| !width=20| !width=20| |- style="background:#cfc;" |align="left"| |4||3||0||1||11||5||+6||6 |- |align="left"| |4||2||0||2||8||6||+2||4 |- |align="left"| |4||1||0||3||6||14||−8||2 |} \---- \---- \---- \---- \---- === Group 3 === {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center" |- !width=175|Team !width=20| !width=20| !width=20| !width=20| !width=20| !width=20| !width=20| !width=20| |- style="background:#cfc;" |align="left"| |4||3||1||0||6||2||+4||7 |- |align="left"| |4||1||2||1||5||6||−1||4 |- |align="left"| |4||0||1||3||2||5||−3||1 |} \---- \---- \---- \---- \---- == Round 2 == {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center" |- !width=175|Team !width=20| !width=20| !width=20| !width=20| !width=20| !width=20| !width=20| !width=20| |- style="background:#cfc;" |align="left"| |4||3||1||0||7||1||+6||7 |- style="background:#cfc;" |align="left"| |4||1||1||2||3||4||−1||3 |- |align="left"| |4||1||0||3||1||6||−5||2 |} United Arab Republic and Tunisia qualify. \---- \---- \---- \---- \---- == References == Category:Football qualification for the 1960 Summer Olympics Category:Football at the Summer Olympics – Men's African Qualifiers
